title: Position in Queue "Over 20000"
body: I just tried to log into my League of Legends account only to receive a note letting me know I am "Over 20000" in the queue to be logged in and my approximate wait time is 20 minutes? What is this I have never seen this before?

replies.body: Riot really not even an update?? What is everyone over there doing besides disabling Rengar?
i LOL'd at this
:( rito lost promos to a rengar. this is their solution.

obligatory
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/LqSg9yVfzV0/maxresdefault.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfess,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eKijiL7E,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2016-02-26T09:32:54.989+0000)
>
> obligatory

Vegeta, what does the scouter say about the log in queue?  {{champion:17}}
Yup same here. Wait time increases every time the position check resets.
Same here :(

Same...maybe there actually is 20,000 ppl trying to get on all at the same time. However, I don't think anyone is playing any games at all as of right now bc I don't think anyone has made it through unfortunately..

This is the same thing that is happening to me. My wait time was 20,000 ahead of me with a 45 min wait... Now it's telling me a 2 plus hour wait and I've already waited an hour. :/ Just doing things around the house with league login music in the background XD

Don't worry, it'll raise. At the moment I lost connection after it just reached 50 minutes.
{{champion:32}}

WOOOOOO I logged on!








Just kidding. COME ON MY GIRLFRIEND IS AT WORK THIS IS MY TIME TO SHYYYYNE.
I feel you!!! Been trying to get on for two hours now :/
Don't worry guys we no longer have to worry about the time jumping all around anymore. Now the server is completely down.
now I'm at 3 hours 21 minutes
My timer is getting higher instead of getting lower in Q. Just wanna play some ranked. lol
SAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAME

> [{quoted}](name=DirkDiggler420,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eKijiL7E,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2016-02-26T03:14:53.991+0000)
>
> My timer is getting higher instead of getting lower in Q. Just wanna play some ranked. lol

ikr meetoo{{champion:12}} Dis is BULL
Riot I love how u can disable Rengar right now due to an in game bug but you cant fix the logon issue everyone's having. I mean IDK the Rengar issue might be higher priority.
I've got the same thing and when i let the timer run out it tells me "server is busy try again later" over and over again
sameee D:

Same here. Came to forums expecting to see an alert under service status. Must have started pretty recently for first mention to be 3 minutes ago.

Literally never seen a login queue *ever.*
I have a few times its usually followed by servers being down for a bit.
Maintenance 6.4

Rito fix your damn Servers. Instead of making Ultimate Skins and Chroma skins, how about you fix the server and fix bugs.
{{champion:32}}

I was at about 15 minutes at the start. THEN about four Position checks later I am at 6 hours and 30 minutes. gg
{{item:3070}}
i had a 3 hour wait time but it just kicked me out of the wait time and is now giving me "the server is currently busy, please try again later"

So after trying to log in on a "2 hour 30 min" wait time and watching it increase all day while switching back and forth between league and twitch, I finally get "The server is currently busy. Please try again later." lolololol {{summoner:14}}

Riot has so many players investing real money into the game and they cant even make normal server that can work properly
Thinking about following my friends and give up on this junk....

For ever 3 minutes that pass, 3 minutes is added to the que timer instead of subtracted. also, the que timer lines up exactly with the riot post at 12:38, ie, they changed something at that point and it has been messed up since then.

The point of the matter is, the que isn't draining, it's growing.

Edit: ayyyyy I'm in
Make a billion dollars last year, still can't create proper servers, balance or different gamemodes. Riot for President.
same, i dont know what to do

i feel you right now i have the same problem but now its starting to go down pretty quicly
{{summoner:21}}

Wtf Riot! First 3 attempts to connect and no connection to server, followed by no website access, then a que of 3+ hours followed by an error code, now a never ending login status... Get yo shiiite together!
YES! IT'S WORKING!
Rito pls. {{item:2043}} {{item:3070}}
the sever is currently busy please try again later. " -RIOT GAMES 2016!!! FFS

Because of the new patches, everyone is trying to update and get back on at once. Instead of being ungrateful for the wait, be grateful that they are making us wait so the servers don't crash from the mass amounts of people logging in. 
I was at 3 hours and 40 min. Now I'm at 1 hour and 23 min. I've waited maybe 30.
The Approx time is just an approximation. People can cancel their que when they are tired of waiting so that puts you up in the higher que. 
just be patient. Riot is probably doing everything they can to fix this. 
In the mean time how about going and watching some League videos to learn how to play the game. Im tired of the Bronze life because of teams. Just saying. XD {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Listen, I understand some people don't understand the way computers, servers, networks, and etc works. Look up cloud computing servers. It isn't difficult or cost inefficient to have the ability to spin up servers to accommodate a flux in traffic so "ungrateful for the wait" so the game doesn't crash doesn't hold much credibility or sense here. ;)
ill pay money to not wait oh wait everyone who plays league most likely has through the shop. Riot does a terrible job at keeping their  servers up.

I got home from work four hours ago, and I finally got in. and then told that there is a LoL ESports game going on and letting me know attrox and rengar is disabled but yeah I didn't end my que once and it changed from 1 45 to 2 30 to 3 45 down to 2 20 then back to 3 40 then 1 45 then back to 3 hours and then server is busy message... I would have just like to have Riot say something rather then letting so many people sit around watching a timer go up for three to four hours... Just saying
This game is all-around crap. I don't even...

This is exact message I am receiving ... over 20,000 people ahead of me for getting logged in. :/
BRUH!!!!! I am FREAKING DONE WAITING. NA RITO ftw
So was it a denial of service initiated by someone or just some bug from one of the updates?
Yo Same except mine is a 30 minute wait. like WTFFFFFFFFFF.
Me too, this is bull {{champion:12}}
Yeah I just now went to play and my time is going up, not down. This is why Riot needed more than one server...
just let me log on!
